title: LLMs
subtext: AI systems for understanding and generating text.
author: Buzzpy

description.title: LLMs
texts: LLMs (Large Language Models) are advanced AI systems that can understand, generate, and interact with human language. They are trained on vast amounts of text data to perform a variety of language-related tasks.
Imagine a robot that has read all the books in the library and can talk about any topic.
